content: leaf love baby sweater is a classic cardigan for any boy or girl this is knit top down with an offset button front and lace panel the adorable handmade buttons can be found in the etsy shop katrinkles 1 this pattern is available in english and italian kindly translated by barbara ajroldi 2 2 http //www ravelry com/people/ajroldi 1 https //www etsy com/shop/katrinkles ref=l2-shopheader-name
